entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain showers at times heavy in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 near noon then light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
